Enter an activity name, list sequence and earned points. Activities with zero points are displayed only and can not be selected by the user. Check Key Result and Leadership Activity if applicable. Check "Allow Qty" if the user can enter a quantity. Enter an optional description. If Required text is specified, the user must enter additional verification information. Additional custom fields for this activity can also be specified.
